TextBlock.Text: BOBER: We have just arrived on the troll face version. It was hard to find since there is sand EVERYWHERE, but we found the engraving.
BILLY: Yup. It's right there, and appears to continue the coordinate we saw earlier. It goes from the bottom left to top left.
BOBER: And above it, a picture of Cludos and Rico.
KATHERYNE: Well if it is similar as it was to last time, we should wait until the moon orbits Cludos and land on that version.
